metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2013 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the xps_parse_color function inxps/xps-common.c in MuPDF 1.3 and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via a large number of entries in the ContextColorvalue of the Fill attribute in a Path element.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.3-2
mupdf-tools - 1.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3-2').
